name: 3D Infinite Airplane Flight - Free Plane Racing Simulation Game
name_original: 3D Infinite Airplane Flight - Free Plane Racing Simulation Game
description:
◉◉ 3D Infinite Airplane Flight ◉◉

◉◉ WILL YOU BEAT THE BILLIONAIRE PILOTS FROM THE GOLDEN ALBATROSS CLUB? ◉◉

◉◉ FLY AGAINST OTHER PILOTS AROUND THE WORLD! ◉◉

◉◉ SUPER FAST PLANES! HUGE EXPLOSIONS!!! ◉◉

You are a pilot of Wonderful Airlines, owned by world famous billionaire, Guy Montana.

Montana is a maverick who loves racing with fast planes against his fellow billionaires from the Golden Albatross club.

This time they are racing for 50 million dollars in cash!

There are two passenger planes and two jet planes to choose from. Each of them has nitro on board!

Are you ready to join into this super fast, dangerous race among crazy billionaires?!

This flying game is also a multiplayer game, where you can fly against real pilots around the world!

◉ Multiplayer!
◉ Leader boards!
◉ Beautiful 3D graphics!
◉ TURBO!
◉ Great music!
◉ Fun for hours!
◉ Huge explosions!

Who will win the race!?? Will it be you?!
